title: Star Wars: The Force Awakens
description: Three decades after the defeat of the Galactic Empire, a new threat arises. The First Order attempts to rule the galaxy and only a rag-tag group of heroes can stop them, along with the help of the Resistance.

title: Sisters
description: Two sisters decide to throw one last house party before their parents sell their family home.

title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
description: Through a series of misunderstandings, Alvin, Simon and Theodore come to believe that Dave is going to propose to his new girlfriend in Miami...and dump them. They have three days to get to him and stop the proposal, saving themselves not only from losing Dave but possibly from gaining a terrible stepbrother.

title: Saul fia
description: In the horror of 1944 Auschwitz, a prisoner forced to burn the corpses of his own people finds moral survival upon trying to salvage from the flames the body of a boy he takes for his son.

title: La dame dans l'auto avec des lunettes et un fusil
description: The trials and tribulations of Dany Dorm√©us.

title: Noma My Perfect Storm
description: After winning a Best Restaurant In The World award in 2010, 2011, 2012, and 2014, chef Rene Redzepi discusses his Copenhagen restaurant Noma and how his culinary philosophy has shaped its success.

title: Extraction
description: A former CIA operative is kidnapped by a group of terrorists. When his son learns there is no plan for his father to be saved, he launches his own rescue operation.

title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2
description: As the war of Panem escalates to the destruction of other districts by the Capitol, Katniss Everdeen, the reluctant leader of the rebellion, must bring together an army against President Snow, while all she holds dear hangs in the balance.

title: Creed
description: The former World Heavyweight Champion Rocky Balboa serves as a trainer and mentor to Adonis Johnson, the son of his late friend and former rival Apollo Creed.

title: The Good Dinosaur
description: In a world where dinosaurs and humans live side-by-side, an Apatosaurus named Arlo makes an unlikely human friend.

title: Krampus
description: A boy who has a bad Christmas ends up accidentally summoning a Christmas demon to his family home.

title: In the Heart of the Sea
description: A recounting of a whaling ship's sinking by a giant whale in 1820 that would inspire the great novel, Moby Dick.
